review: Was able to acquire my stick for under $20.00 by invitation as a Prime Member.  This is a great little media player whose effectiveness goes up exponentially when used in conjunction with the accompanying Android phone app.  I have a Chromecast installed on another TV and while I like the Chromecast, there are many advantages to the stick compared with it.  The user interface is intuitive, content search and playback are a snap.  Voice search using the Android app is outstanding.  Video and audio quality are superb.  One disclaimer.  Content management (building playlists, deleting watched items) is cumbersome and sometimes impossible.  The end user is far better off doing content management on a pc and then using the stick strictly as a playback and streaming device.  I would recommend this gadget even at the MSRP of $39.00.  A must have for Prime subscribers.
